attributes.action: Force all mortgage lenders to reduce their Standard Variable Rates by the same % as any reductions in the Bank of England's interest rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is a scandal that lenders can use reductions in the Bank of England interest rate, to effectively increase their margins / profits, at the expense of ordinary mortgage borrowers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
